description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.100% satisfaction is guaranteed.  ★ ★ ★ ★ ★


WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy, on-the-go learning app to help you get started on Bosnian language. A beginner's guide that teaches you the basics in a nice and organized manner.  Fast, easy, and fun way to learn Bosnian. 

Features include phrasebook, tutorials.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Bosnian, anytime, anywhere!

Meeting friends and co-workers from Bosnia could be much more fun with this app. Focus is on everyday phrases and words.

App tools include search feature.



Includes following tutorials:

Why learn Bosnian,
Tips for Effective Language Learning.


Includes following phrasebooks:

Greetings and General Words,
Phrases for Courtesy,
Food, Drink and Going Out,
Places, People, and Family,
Travelling Around,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping,
Sports and the Outdoors,
Dating.


What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for a lifetime of on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A simple ‘n easy WAGmob app in every hand.

Please write to us at Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
